Body.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus), eco leather back, aluminum frame
Body.\u00a0: IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 1.5m for 30 mins)

Display.Type: LTPO2 AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 1000 nits (HBM), 1500 nits (peak)

Platform.CPU: Octa-core (1x3.19 GHz Cortex-X2 & 3x2.75 GHz Cortex-A710 & 4x1.80 GHz Cortex-A510)

Main Camera.Triple:
50.3 MP, f/1.9, 23mm (wide), 1.0"-type, 1.6µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, Laser AF, OIS
48 MP, f/4.1, 120mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.0", 0.8µm, PDAF, OIS, 5x optical zoom
48 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 128˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.0", 0.8µm, Dual-Pixel PDAF
TOF 3D, (depth)
Main Camera.Features: Leica lenses, Dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6e, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA
Comms.Bluetooth: 5.2, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive
Comms.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5)

Features.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, compass, color spectrum, barometer

Battery.Charging:
67W wired, PD3.0, QC4, 100% in 41 min (advertised)
50W wireless, 100% in 52 min (advertised)
10W reverse wireless
